title: Choppy Game??
body:
So sometimes when im playing my audio will start cutting out, then video will randomly have a fit and play up for like 2-3 seconds (Really choppy i can barely move) Sometimes this happens alot in one match and can even cause it to crash. I would like to know why this is doing this despite me having closed every other program and still have high League cpu usage
Specs are 
1080, I7 7700k, z270, 16gb ddr4 Tried putting onto ssd and same thing too.

replies.body:
Are your GPU drivers up to date?

Past that I'm not totally sure what could cause such issues, so I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
